meanings.definition: The quality of being fearsome or causing fear.
meanings.sent1: The fearsomeness of the dark forest made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: The horror movie was filled with fearsomeness.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy tried to mimic fearsomeness by barking at its own reflection.
meanings.sent4: The storm approached with a fearsomeness that sent chills down our spines.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house was designed to evoke a sense of fearsomeness in visitors.
